scripts.prepare:holesky: npm run generate-const:holesky && npm run generate-yaml:holesky && npm run generate-types:holesky
scripts.build:holesky: npm run prepare:holesky && npm run generate-wasm:holesky
scripts.test:holesky: npm run prepare:holesky && npm run generate-tests-yaml:holesky && graph test
scripts.deploy-hosted:holesky: npm run prepare:holesky && npm run deploy network:holesky node:hosted
scripts.deploy-local:holesky: npm run prepare:holesky && npm run deploy network:holesky node:local
scripts.prepare:mainnet: npm run generate-const:mainnet && npm run generate-yaml:mainnet && npm run generate-types:mainnet
scripts.build:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && npm run generate-wasm:mainnet
scripts.test:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && npm run generate-tests-yaml:mainnet && graph test
scripts.deploy-hosted:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && npm run deploy network:mainnet node:hosted
scripts.deploy-local:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && npm run deploy network:mainnet node:local
scripts.prepare:chiado: npm run generate-const:chiado && npm run generate-yaml:chiado && npm run generate-types:chiado
scripts.build:chiado: npm run prepare:chiado && npm run generate-wasm:chiado
scripts.test:chiado: npm run prepare:chiado && npm run generate-tests-yaml:chiado && graph test
scripts.deploy-hosted:chiado: npm run prepare:chiado && npm run deploy network:chiado node:hosted
scripts.deploy-local:chiado: npm run prepare:chiado && npm run deploy network:chiado node:local
